RDPDFLib.view

Interface PDFViewListener

  • RDPDFLib.view.PDFViewListener

  • public interface PDFViewListener
    Interface for dealing with reading and user interaction events

        Invoked when vAnnotPerform invoked or new note annotation added.
        Parameters:
        annot - PDFAnnot which is clicked
        subj - Subject of the text note poped up
        text - Text of the text note poped up

      • OnPDFSelecting

        void OnPDFSelecting(Canvas canvas, PDFRect rect1, PDFRect rect2);
        Invoked when selecting text
        Parameters:
        canvas - Canvas which the selected text was drawn onto
        rect1 - A PDFRect which indicates the first char location
        rect2 - A PDFRect which indicates the second char location
        Returns:
         

      • OnPDFSingleTapped

        Boolean OnPDFSingleTapped(float x, float y);
        Invoked when the PDF page is tapped
        Parameters:
        x - X coordinates of the tapped position
        y - Y coordinates of the tapped position
        Returns:
        True if the tap event is processed, other listeners will not process this event again.
